channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:03 Driven the threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Salt for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:03 Driven the threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 01:03 Return the threat of the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Record on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:03 Return the threat of the use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). Record on further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
